item.description:
January 12, 2010


HAPPY NEW YEAR... AND BLESSINGS ON ALL OF YOU AND YOUR LOVED ONES!

Time is flying and I hope your New Year so far was joyful and peaceful. I hope this note of mine finds you all well and in good health. Here after a bout of flu I am up and running once again.

Just to let you know that our upcoming Interfaith Book Club meeting is going to take place on January 24 at 4:00pm at the Peace Abbey in Sherborn. So mark your calendar:

TIME: January 24, 2009 at 4:00PM
PLACE: PEACE ABBEY - Two North Main Street, Sherborn, MA 01770

We continue our reflection on MATTHEW FOX's book: "ONE RIVER, MANY WELLS". CHAPTER FOUR: "RELATING TO THE FUTURE, WHAT THE DIVINE IS ASKING OF US & CHAPTER FIVE: "WHERE DO WE GO FROM HERE" (377-439).

I hope to see all of you... for we are always enriched by the presence of each other and by our common reflection and sharing.

See you soon!

Blessings on you and your family and may this New Year enable us to be channels of peace and reconciliation.

PEACE
Fr. Joe, sx
St. Francis Xavier Missionaries
(508) 429-2144
pino.ma@gmail.com

PS: A reminder: our next book is: THOMAS MERTON, THE INNER EXPERIENCE, Notes on Contemplation...
item.name: INTERFAITH BOOK CLUB MEETING
